name: Codename C.U.B.E
description:
This game is a 3D 3rd person Twin Stick Bullet Hell Arcade game inspired by old classics like Asteroid, Space Invaders, and Doom. In Codename C.U.B.E, you play as a one of many types of spaceships traveling through  space bounded to one of several mysterious cube like objects that manifest levels for the player to traverse and battle enemy ships and bosses. Each level has a different modifier that changes up the gameplay like floor lasers, turrents, shield generators, and etc. 

There are two game modes, one is a classic game mode where the player can select the game difficulty and battle against enemies in a closed off room, by finishing off all the enemies, the player will be allowed to travel to the room and repeat the task again. The goal is to clear as many rooms as possible before you lose all your lives. At the very end, your score is totaled up and added to the player exp which may cause the player to level up if enough points were earned. These points are used to unlock new ships and levels for the player to use. The other game mode is a boss rush mode where you take on all the bosses in the game in a random order with your time being recorded. The goal is to defeat all the bosses as quick as possible. Each boss in this game has its own style. This game mode that will put the player's skills to the test.

There are over 15 levels, 20 player ships, 10 enemy types, and 15 bosses to experience. The soundtrack also features a lot of great artist that go well with each level. There is also an assist mode that makes playing much easier.

**Must Have PS4 Controller Or Xbox One Controller to play**

Its also out on Android

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HighPixelLabs.CodenameCUBE
